summary: Provides specialized utilities for building command‑line interfaces, including a parser and argument group that treat hyphens and underscores as interchangeable and allow per‑option custom help, along with custom actions for storing values, constants, and boolean flags.
business_intent: Enable developers of the Accelerate framework to create consistent, user‑friendly CLI commands without worrying about naming variations or repetitive help‑text handling, thereby streamlining command definition and parsing.
